results.description: England-based Macauley Bonne withdraws from the Zimbabwe squad days after getting his passport allowing him to play in Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers.
results.shortTitle: Bonne forced out of Zimbabwe squad
results.title: Macauley Bonne forced out of Zimbabwe squad on 'medical grounds'

results.description: Kuda Mapira, known as 'The Terminator', is one of the first disabled people to play football for his country.
results.title: Meet 'The Terminator', Zimbabwe's disabled footballer

results.description: Marvelous Nakamba wants to use his time at English club Aston Villa to promote a better image of Zimbabwe and inspire a new generation of players.
results.shortTitle: Aston Villa's Nakamba wants to promote Zimbabwe
results.title: Aston Villa's Marvelous Nakamba wants to promote Zimbabwe

thumbnail.altText: Zimbabwe and Aston Villa's Marvelous Nakamba

results.description: Joey Antipas is appointed as Zimbabwe national team coach on a caretaker basis until the end of the year.
results.shortTitle: Zimbabwe appoint Antipas as caretaker coach
results.title: Zimbabwe appoint Joey Antipas as caretaker coach

thumbnail.altText: Zimbabwe at the Africa Cup of Nations

results.description: DR Congo give themselves a chance of qualifying for the last 16 of the Africa Cup of Nations with a comfortable win over Zimbabwe.
results.shortTitle: DR Congo win keeps Afcon hopes alive
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: DR Congo thrash Zimbabwe 4-0 to stay in contention

thumbnail.altText: Britt Assombalanga celebrates scoring against Zimbabwe

results.description: Egypt beat Uganda & DR Congo hammer Zimbabwe in the final round of Group A games at the 2019 African Cup of Nations.
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Salah & Elmohamady score as Egypt beat Uganda

results.description: Uganda and Zimbabwe play out an entertaining draw in Group A of the Africa Cup of Nations in Cairo.
results.shortTitle: Zimbabwe miss out on rare Afcon win
results.title: Uganda 1-1 Zimbabwe: Africa Cup of Nations Group A game ends in draw in Cairo

altText: Patrick Kaddu célèbre le but de l'Ouganda à l'ouverture de la Coupe d'Afrique des Nations 2019
Uganda celebrate scoring at the Nations Cup

results.description: Hosts Egypt beat Zimbabwe in the first match of the Africa Cup of Nations - the first time the tournament has been held in Europe's summer.
results.shortTitle: Egypt win Africa Cup of Nations opener
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Hosts Egypt beat Zimbabwe in first game of tournament

results.description: Hosts Egypt win the opening game of the 2019 Africa Cup of Nations against Zimbabwe at the Cairo International Stadium.
results.shortTitle: Afcon: Hosts Egypt get off to winning start against Zimbabwe
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Egypt v Zimbabwe

thumbnail.altText: Mahmoud 'Trezeguet' Hassan (centre) celebrates with his teammates

results.description: Holders Zimbabwe book a place against Zambia in the semi-finals of the southern African Cosafa Cup with Lesotho to play Botswana in the other semi-final.
results.title: Cosafa Cup: Zimbabwe to face Zambia in semis with Lesotho up against Botswana
